descriptionHtml:
This mod add "VAR" , an Antiarmor weapon form" Valkyria Chronicles III"

I.Var Antiarmormode
It's a crossbow type weapon with "Automatic Crossbows"'s scripts form J3X.
so as an automatic firearm ,when you equip it and right click & hold it'll launch 4 rounds bullets, then second time will launch 3 rounds ,finally the third time will be launch 4 rounds and reload.

II.Var Meleemode
A greatsword type weapon.

III.20mm Antiarmor Bullets/INV
IV.20mm Explosion Bullets/INV

All can be forge in material Dwarven.

[b]Credit[/b]
[b]J3X-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26329/?]Automatic Crossbows[/url][/b]
[b]Ghosu-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26653/?]Project Flintlock Rifle[/url][/b]
author: Cheng Fung aka MartinRam
